name: elevenlabs-player
description: Audio Player MCP app that plays any audio file from within your MCP client. Supports queueing multiple tracks with playlist view, playback controls, progress bar, and speed adjustment.

tools.name: play_audio
tools.description: Adds one or more audio tracks to the ElevenLabs Player queue. Each track requires a filePath and title. Audio data is loaded on-demand when playback starts.

tools.name: load_audio
tools.description: Loads audio data for a single file. Called by the player UI when playback starts.
